availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky brick mason. Virginia native. Married Mary Peters. Father of Anna E. Peters, Mary Peters, Charles Peters, Peter Peters, Millard Peters, and Catherine Peters.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 148. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Jamestown District, p. 35. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Dayton, p. 10.
